title: SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 220 Ophthalmic Assistant Posts
description: The State Health Society (SHS), Bihar, has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 220 Ophthalmic Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 12th, Diploma can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of applicatio...
